item.title: R to @joshmillard: i need to be extremely clear that i am not being ironic and condemning anti-violent censorship or whatever, I think all shooters and civilization would be better of if this were really a thing, just like we'd be in a genuinely slightly better place on the whole, gimme finger guns

item.description: i need to be extremely clear that i am not being ironic and condemning anti-violent censorship or whatever, I think all shooters and civilization would be better of if this were really a thing, just like we'd be in a genuinely slightly better place on the whole, gimme finger guns

item.title: federal legislation requiring every game that has realistic guns to include a "finger guns" mode where it's just finger guns and making PEW PEW noises instead and people fall down dramatically but unconvincingly pretending to die

item.title: just found myself wondering and thinking "nah they must have done something about it by now" but I checked and nope the canonical photoshop clone for Linux is still called GIMP so hey probably the year of the desktop any day now chaps

item.description: just found myself wondering and thinking "nah they must have done something about it by now" but I checked and nope the canonical photoshop clone for Linux is still called GIMP so hey probably the year of the desktop any day now chaps

item.title: R to @joshmillard: (clarification to the universe, please do not let the incurious dunderheads show more initiative)

item.title: R to @joshmillard: like where's my incredibly tedious 3 hour takedown video on Sol Lewitt's "Sentences on Conceptual Art", that's some absolutely primo fisking material for some incurious dunderhead if they'd just show a little goddam initiative for once in their miserable lives

item.title: R to @griph: what pisses me off as someone who really likes a lot of op art and minimalism stuff is nobody with bad alt-right opinions about art history even knows enough to shit on like Frank Stella or Bridget Riley or whatever, like fuckin' develop some more nuanced shitty opinions chuds
